fields.name: Install Carpet:
fields.value: Grant your target a permanent Defense Power boost equal to (0.5 * your score). Example: score 50%, boost 0.25. If this is used on the same player multiple times, only the most recent boost counts.

fields.name: Helping Hand (2x):
fields.value: Use Install Carpet on two players tonight.

fields.name: Carpet Cleaning (1x, Locked, Charge 75%):
fields.value: Unlocked when you place in the top half three times. Astrally roleblock anyone who attacks your target. This ability can only be used on players you previously Installed Carpet for.

fields.name: Disturbed Fibers (Passive):
fields.value: Learn how many players attack your previous Install Carpet targets, and the exact score of each attacker. For example: Bob, attacked by 35.0% score and 42.0% score.
